transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi ma'am, very good afternoon. Main Samyak baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Ma'am actually aapne abhi call kiya tha aap shayad aapne 9696 number se. To main jaan sakta hu aapki kya issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Mera jo team account handling karti hai Muskan Choudhary jo number diya gaya hai mujhe.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji Muskan Choudhary ma'am.
Customer: Ji to unka contact bhi unse koi contact nahi ho raha hai, unse baat bhi nahi ho rahi hai. To unka number bhi band aa raha hai isliye maine customer care mein call kiya.
Executive: No issue ma'am, main bata deta hu. Ma'am actually na wo abhi leave pe gayi hui hai, unke ghar pe na kuch miss happening ho gayi hai. That's why wo leave pe hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To aap mere ko bata sakte hai kya issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Haan mujhe ye issue aa raha hai ki humne TrustSeal ka package liya hua hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur hamare lead ka bhi issue hua hai but mujhe jis type ke wholesale ke leads chahiye maine pehle bhi kafi baar unko bola hua hai but us type ka mujhe koi bhi response nahi mil raha hai to aur maine abhi aaj check kiya apne phone se bhi ki main wholesellers se search karti hu to mujhe unhone bataya tha jaise ki aap package dete hain to aapka naam jo hai wo aayega TrustSeal package mein aap phir aap update karenge kuch bhi. To maine apne do teen phone numbero se aur check kiya ki hamara page kahi bhi dikh hi nahi raha hai upar.
Executive: Matlab as a upar in the sense ma'am?
Customer: Jaise agar aap ek customer hai aapne inquiry ki.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To unhone jaise bataya tha ki aapko inquiry karenge to aapka page ma'am dikhega TrustSeal package mein to better hoga. Maine try kiya ki Surat mein kahi near bhi maine Surat mein bhi kiya ki kahi pe agar main embroidered fabric search karti hu, Sherwani fabric search karti hu to hamara page dikh raha hai ki nahi but aisa kuch bhi show nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Main ek minute check kar leta hu, just a minute, ek second dena.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Shree Ghanshyam, okay Shree Ghanshyam.
Executive: Ma'am main bata deta hu uska reason kya hai. Actually na apan abhi jo apna time of duration abhi pichla nikal ke gaya hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usme hum log bilkul bhi active nahi the, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan usme hum log like jaise Diwali leaves thi hamare yaha festival ke leaves thi aur uske baad jo hua ki mere category ke leads bhi nahi mere hum deal karte hain Sherwani fabric mein. To embroidered fabric jo aa rahe hain hum only men's wear mein kar rahe hain hum.
Customer: Jaise Diwali
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai. Haan to mere paas wahi category. Agar show bhi hoti hai to wo retail quantity hai, mera wholesale ka kaam hai aur wo retail ki agar main unpe call karti hu ya baat bhi karti hu lead manager pe maine jitne bhi kiye hain sab pe call kiye hue hain to sabka aisa hi hai ki wo retail quantity pe deal kar rahe hain agar quantity bhi mention hai to madam mujhe 5 meter chahiye, 4 meter chahiye ya phir mujhe nahi chahiye.
Executive: Aapko show nahi ho rahi bilkul bhi?
Customer: Mera pichle year ka bhi yahi package tha isiliye main IndiaMART pe nahi kar rahi thi but unhone mujhe bola ma'am is baar aap ek baar try kariye jo jo hum bolte hain to maine sab kiya but mujhe abhi waisa koi response nahi mil raha hai jo mujhe chahiye.
Executive: Just sorry ma'am aapko jaisa bhi aapko laga ho. Aur mujhe bola bhi gaya hua tha ki aapke hamari team se aapko barabar call jata rahega follow up hota rahega kya issue aayega to mujhe agar wo leave pe hai ya koi bhi hai main jab tak call nahi karu to waha se mujhe kabhi koi call nahi aaya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ma'am actually wo aapko assign hai shayad ho sakta hai unhone unko call nahi kar paya hoga aapko but wo log abhi unke ghar pe kuch miss happening ho rakhi hai isliye leave pe hai. To isliye wo connect bhi nahi kar pa rahi.
Customer: Haan wo main samajh gayi isliye main issue hai. Ji ji bilkul.
Executive: Ma'am actually main jiske paas account assign hota hai na wo usko call karte hain wo account matlab jo account manager ke paas accounts assign hote hain na wo us account pe call kar sakte hain actually. So it is a rule from IndiaMART team.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Ya is vajah se aapke paas aur koi call nahi aaya hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ya and baat rahi ma'am aap jo keh rahe hain ki aapko bulk buyleads nahi aa rahi hai uska reason bas simple sa ek hai ki aap pehle apan log bilkul bhi active nahi the like apna jo last previous transaction hai na June, July, August, September.
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: Unme beech mein apne do mahine service bhi deactivate ho gayi thi, right?
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: Aur uske baad aapne September mein aapne karaya to apna phir se jitna apna ban paya tha last time mein ki haan ab dheere dheere generate ho raha hai apni inquiries wagera aana start hui thi wo phir se deboost ho gayi thi. To usko wapas start karne ke liye hum logo ko kam se kam ek se do teen mahine lagenge ki hum log pure month mein like apan consume kare proper kyuki aapko month ki approx approx 120 buyleads milti hai month ki.
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: Haan but main 120 isliye consume nahi kar pa rahi hu kyuki mere type ki nahi hai Sherwani fabrics mein deal kar rahe hain hum ethnic wear mein embroidered fabrics mein isme men's wear hai mein to wo ladies wear mein aa rahi hai.
Customer: But.
Executive: Okay. Aur aapka sabse jyada kaunsa aapne bataya fabric?
Customer: Sherwani fabric. Sherwani fabric.
Executive: And second one is?
Customer: Embroidered men's garment ka hi hai Indo western fabrics ethnic fabrics ethnic mein karte hain to aisa hai ki main jo lagwa rahi hu usme tag mein usme ethnic kar rahi hu to ethnic men's mein wo aur wo embroidered mein women ke jyada aa rahe hain. To category mujhe unhone bola tha four five category madam aap choose kariye. To embroidered to women's mein bhi hai aur men's mein bhi hai.
Executive: Jyada aapne bola tha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Okay main ek baar check kar leta hu. Aur main abhi is baar active hi hu main office mein hi hu but mujhe yahi hai ki ek baar aap please try kariye ki page mein aap jo bole main product bhi roz update kar deti hu agar aisa ho to one week mein main do teen product upload karti hu but page mera upar dikhe aur because wo hai ki ek baar follow up ke liye aur main bhi call karu.
Executive: Theek hai aap mera main aapko abhi number apna share kar dunga whatsapp pe jab tak wo aa nahi rahe hain aap mere se contactable rahe aap mere se connect kariye no issue aur main aapko ek baar na video link aapko bhej raha hu theek hai video call link usse main aapko thoda bahut catalog wagera edit kar lu aur like aapko bata pau ki aapka page kyu nahi upar aa raha dikha ke jyada acche se explain kar paunga kyuki abhi aap aise aapko main bata nahi paunga ki like aap bhi confuse honge main bhi confuse hounga okay to just connect this video call I will share matlab aapki mail id pe maine aapko share kiya hai aap just check kariye ma'am go through kariye mail id.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Aur TrustSeal ka certificate page aane wala tha office pe wo bhi abhi aaya nahi hai actually.
Executive: Ma'am actually yaha se wo post ho chuka hai ma'am thode time mein aapke paas pahunch jayega wo.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Aapne mujhe send ki hai ek second.
Executive: Haan Samyak ke naam se aaya hoga ma'am.
Customer: Aapne kaunse mail id pe ki hai?
Executive: Ek minute main check karta hu.
Executive: Rakesh.
Customer: Nahi nahi us pe nahi hai actually mail id hai shreeghanshyam711@gmail.com.
Executive: Just just a minute main likh leta hu ek minute.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Batayiyega ma'am mail id.
Customer: Shree Ghanshyam. Spelling spelling ke sath ek baar bata dijiyega.
Executive: S H R double E.
Executive: R double E Shree.
Customer: Haan Ghanshyam G H A N S H Y A M.
Executive: G A M.
Executive: G A M G H A M.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: S H Y A M.
Executive: Shree Ghanshyam.
Customer: Haan 711.
Executive: 711@gmail.com.
Executive: Haan ek baar whatsapp number bolenge main aapko whatsapp pe bhi share kar deta hu.
Customer: 99799.
Executive: 99799.
Customer: 74003.
Executive: 74003.
Executive: Agar aapko ek baar link show na ho na mere ko ek baar hi kar dijiye to usko show ho jayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ma'am aapko usme meri aawaz aa rahi hai? To main call disconnect kar leta hu ye wali.
Customer: Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account handling manager is not reachable.

- Not receiving expected wholesale leads.

- Page not visible on IndiaMART search.

- TrustSeal certificate not received yet.



Resolution:

- Explained account manager is on leave.

- Explained reasons for low lead generation.

- Shared personal contact for support.

- Promised to share video link for catalog editing.

- Confirmed TrustSeal certificate has been dispatched.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share video link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, account manager, visibility, certificate
